welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hallandale Beach, the charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, lively atmosphere, and diverse attractions. We invite you to relax, soak up the sun, and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, with comfortable lounges and exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves private and charter flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves smaller private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, and is home to several major airlines such as Delta and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to airlines such as JetBlue and Spirit.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, and is home to major airlines such as American and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights, and is home to airlines such as Air Canada and Allegiant.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or have time limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Public Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Public Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport, housing all major airlines and facilities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
